main event: Two white lights were observed in the sky moving erratically over a duration of more than an hour on 30 July 1965.
interesting points: Witnesses described the objects as moving up and down and to the right, The lights stayed in sight for over an hour, One object seemed to disappear into a cloud bank, The objects were round and about the size of a basketball, Witnesses reported having seen similar objects previously.
sighted object: two white lights in the sky
witness description: A retired Aviation Guidance Chief with family members.
